q1.question: Can I book consultations individually?
q1.answer: Yes, all consultations can be booked individually. However, packages offer significant savings.

q2.question: How long are packages valid?
q2.answer: Consultation sessions can be flexibly redeemed within 12 months of purchase.

q3.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
q3.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee if no consultation has been used.

q4.question: Can I choose between online and in-person consultation?
q4.answer: Yes, all consultations are available both online and in-person at our office.
